com.devpaul.bluetoothutillib.utils

Class BluetoothUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devpaul.bluetoothutillib.utils.BluetoothUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.bluetooth.BluetoothProfile.ServiceListener

    public class BluetoothUtility
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.bluetooth.BluetoothProfile.ServiceListener
    Created by Paul Tsouchlos Class that handles all bluetooth adapter stuff and connecting to devices, establishing sockets listening for connections and reading/writing data on the sockets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BluetoothUtility.InputStreamType
      Type of input streams that can be used for reading bluetooth data.

      • BluetoothUtility

        public BluetoothUtility(android.content.Context context,
                        android.app.Activity refActivity,
                        BluetoothHandler handler)
        Constructor for BluetoothUtility This class is a wrapper class for a BluetoothAdapter and makes a lot of its functionality easier.
        Parameters:
        context - context from the calling activity or fragment.
        refActivity - reference to the calling activity.
        handler - a handler for handling read data and other messages. See BluetoothHandler for more information.

        public void connectA2DPProxy(android.bluetooth.BluetoothA2dp bluetoothA2dp,
                             android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice a2dpDevice)
        After a proxy is returned, this method connects the a2dp device using the proxy and the class declared method.
        Parameters:

        a2dpDevice - a BluetoothDevice that is an A2DP device.
